slides.title: September 4th After-Market Report
slides.narration: Welcome to your September 4th after-market report. Today showed a broad rally across all major sectors with strong risk-on sentiment dominating the session.

slides.title: ETF Performance
slides.narration: Looking at ETF performance, small caps led the charge with IWM up 1.25%, signaling strong risk appetite as investors moved into smaller companies.

slides.title: Volume Surge Winners
slides.narration: Today's volume surge winners were impressive. AEO jumped nearly 38% on massive volume, while NEGG and CIEN also posted strong double-digit gains.

slides.title: Sector Rotation
slides.narration: In a rare display of market strength, all sectors finished positive today, led by consumer discretionary and technology stocks in a broad-based rally.

slides.title: After-Hours Earnings Winners
slides.narration: After-hours action was dominated by earnings winners. BRZE, GWRE, and IOT all posted significant beats and strong price reactions, with tech leading the way.

slides.title: Key Takeaways
slides.narration: Today's key takeaway: broad market strength with small caps outperforming, high-quality earnings beats, and positive momentum heading into tomorrow's session.
